channel.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed
channel.description: A daily digest of curated Latin American news.

item.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed - September 09, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
How the coup trial of Jair Bolsonaro has divided Brazil — BBC

The ex-president is accused of trying to overturn his election loss but his supporters say it is a witch hunt.

Deportation Fears Are Fueling Money Transfers to Latin America — The New York Times

Money transfers to Guatemala, Honduras and other nations have increased in recent months, totaling billions of dollars. Undocumented migrants in the United States say they are sending money to relatives while they can.
